website_summaries.verdict: Versatile in terms of performance, rugged in appearance, and an attractive price.
pros: Worn for all types of activities with reviews suggesting you go down a size for running purposes
Customer appreciate the price point considering there's no cotton in the material
Described by some customers as an athletic fit, boding well for those at all different running abilities
cons: The underwear rides high, but shouldn't affect your running form

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and performance.
customer_reviews.text: These might be the most comfortable underwear I've ever purchased. I bought them to wear while running, hiking, cycling and They have performed flawlessly at keeping my cool, dry and from chafing. I liked them so much that I purchased another seat, so I can use them for everyday use. They don't have the same level of anti-odor that you get from Merrino wool, but they are much better at blocking odor than my full synthetic Reebok boxer briefs are. These also fit perfect and have an excellent amount of stretch, I have large thighs and they stretch to accommodate perfectly. I highly recommend these, especially considering that other high end active underwear can cost you over $30 per pair.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Potatoes

customer_reviews.title: replace your UA 9" mesh boxer briefs
customer_reviews.text: Under Armor - meet your daddy! UA for some reason stopped making their durable 9" mesh boxer briefs (blue waist band/black bottoms) I read the Tesla description and took a chance. These briefs are everything I was looking for in an alternative to UA. I was able to replace my aging UA briefs with a superior product at a great price. Tesla, please offer a black option. I'm ok with the colors but you'd probably gain more customers with more subdued color.
customer_reviews.author: DQ kid

customer_reviews.title: Poorly-designed garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these underwear get such great reviews, because in my opinion they're poorly-designed garbage. The seams along the legs are poorly placed, such that they run along the inside of the leg, through the crotch where the leg means your nether parts, and out the back - right at the point that sitting between your closed leg and man parts are going to get chafed something fierce. The waistband also sucks, being bigger than the described size. It's too bad, because I like the colors available and the price point is great too.
customer_reviews.author: nhmtnbkr

customer_reviews.title: Probably won’t be buying again unless the cut is modified
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and they look and fit fine everywhere except right in the front. There’s a seam that runs straight down the middle of the crotch that I didn’t notice when ordering, and it looks and feels a little funny when wearing them. Also, the material is a little scratchier than I hoped it would be after wearing other brands’ synthetic boxer-briefs. Also, the name is kind of strange, as it’s already a pretty established car brand at this point...
customer_reviews.author: M. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Fit pretty good, I’m a big fan of tesla gear (socks, shoes, compression, etc) and these are good for the price. The value compared to UA, adidas, etc. is phenomenal but I can only say they are good not excellent. The material seems a little less give and go compared to adidas shorts or others I own. They ride a little and seem to stick to your skin a little. Still for non cotton underwear the value is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stay in place. I ordered a size down and they fit perfect. I also like the little extra room in the front where the mesh conforms where it should. I bought these in search of a compression short that I could wear for sports activity. While the do fit like a 2nd skin, there is no real compression . After wearing these a couple times, I realized that I didn't even feel them as I was wearing them, so while I did not find the compression shorts I was looking for, I did find a very comfortable, light weight and great fitting item. I will order more for day to day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Humes

customer_reviews.title: Supportive & Breathable
customer_reviews.text: The TSLA Men's Relaxed Stretch Open-Fly Cool Dry Brief Mesh Underwear Trunk is both excellent and affordable. These redesigned TSLA briefs feel supportive and comfortable, the fabric is soft, breathable and the contoured pouch might be a little too bold for some. However, they are better than the other Tesla brand that does not pull moisture away from your body.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Worth the chance!
customer_reviews.text: So, my husband LOVES these. We always get him the stay-cool Jockey brand, but the place we get them from was out of them. Needless to say, we figured we would try these because they were way less money and looked to be good. He absolutely loves them! We are seeing how long they will last wearing them weekly before we get more, but so far, they are excellent and they do an excellent job of holding everything in place and keeping him cool for the day, especially when working out.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Replaced ALL my traditional underwear
customer_reviews.text: There are many reason I like these underwear trunks. First, comfort. Second, design with the front "pouch and slot" for using the bathroom! Other products like this have the pouch, but many of them do not have a "slot" for using the bathroom which makes going to the bathroom very inconvenient! Third, overall quality is great from the mesh to the waistband. This has become my everyday wearer for any and all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: KeepingTime

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for long distance running
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all my cotton underwear with these because these are way more comfortable even for every day wear. But what I really love is that they don’t cause friction between my thighs when I run as the cotton once did. I always had really raw skin there after a longer run and had to put petroleum jelly there to prevent it, this is a way nicer solution to that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: These dissipate sweat
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to the gym instead of cotton and they really work. I order a little bit smaller than my normal size so they are snug. They work well, the stitching is adequate and holds together. If you really care about the color, the color does not fade. I use these instead of compression shorts because I dislike compression shorts. This products tends to hold everything in place while running or lifting weights
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Underwear
customer_reviews.text: These fit great. Would definitely go with the 6 inch inseam instead of the 3 inch. They add support where you need it, they stay dry, and they're priced very well for the quality. I have some pairs that are still holding up over two years later! My waist size is 34 and the Medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: FLnative93

customer_reviews.title: SLA Men's (Pack of 2)
customer_reviews.text: The material keeps air movement flowing keeping the under bits cool and dry.. Size is perfect for US sizing as I am a large guy and have been disappointed in the past buying clothes online advertising a size and showing up looking like a piece of child clothing
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tesla products and pricing, these are no different. I don't recommend them for running as they tend to work their way between the cheeks (I tried out of curiosity) but they are great for everyday/casual use which is what I purchased them for. I use the Tesla compression shorts for my workouts. Great price for a 2 pack and the white ones are even cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: MRHD

customer_reviews.title: I love these. But I am so confused- my first ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. But I am so confused- my first order was for medium, and I received large. My second order was for small and I received medium. Either these guys are morons or I am missing something. That's the 3 star rating. Now for the actual product..... I want two pairs of every color. So comfortable,they look sexy af, and they're great for everyday wear, working out, everything. The colors I got (real and green) look awesome. I just wish I knew what size to order.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I have thighs that touch and I was looking for underwear that won't rise up on me. Love the fact that they are compression but it not a thick compression material. It's mesh compression. Which helps with breathability. The mesh let's it breath so Im not dripping sweat instead it's wicking off.
customer_reviews.author: chrisj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These shorts are perfect for working out in. They help keep you from having your skin chap when doing a power walk. I love them! If you are looking for shorts that will help you feel cooler in your nether regions, these will hit the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: No room in the crotch
customer_reviews.text: My issue isn't about sizing as it is about the design. The crotch area from top to bottom is much too small. Perhaps I got a defect bit both pairs are like this. The length and waist are fine but the front area dips to mid abdomen and my member is too uncomfortable. I am an avg size so elephantitus is not the problem. Thank you Tesla for refunding me.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey5b

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I am very active, every day a practice paddle tennis and weekends I go countryside for birding and I used to use cotton underwear then i bought sports brands boxers, one day I found out these and they are the best!!! I strongly recommend Tesla Gears.. Just you need to follow the recommendation about size.... I choose a less size and they fit perfect for me that usually use medium size
customer_reviews.author: eljlm

customer_reviews.title: Initially excellent, but....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent out of the packet BUT will lose its ‘fit’ and overall comfort after a few washes. Dissatisfied and will not purchase again or recommend. Amazon delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: RetVAFireMan

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend something else.
customer_reviews.text: Too big in the waste and too small in the thigh. I Tried to return these and they want $7 to send them back. Half the cost. Just guaranteed that I won't be trying a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Peacock

customer_reviews.title: the seems seemed thick but so far have not been in comfortable like the convience of the fly
customer_reviews.text: these do everything I was hoping for. they are not what I would call true compression wear but they keep everything in place and stay in place themselves.the seems seemed thick but so far have not been in comfortable like the convience of the fly. only wish they were a bit less expensive
customer_reviews.author: equis

customer_reviews.title: The legs are long, but the rise is short
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, there's less room in the upper half of the brief than you might like if you're larger than average. Anyone with a butt will find the waistband doesn't quite accommodate, sitting lower and providing less coverage than you might like.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jeske

customer_reviews.title: Plan to stock up on these
customer_reviews.text: Great breathable material! Beyond happy with my purchase. Was concerned initially with the sizing and the reviews I was finding about this product -- I have a size 28 waist and the size Small fit like a glove. Not intrusively tight either around the jewels, which is hard to come by for compression boxers.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: fit was really good, the 9 inch legs stay down
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear large, ordered these in medium, fit was really good, the 9 inch legs stay down, fly could overlap more is why 4 stars. I now wear these when I exercise as well as general wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not a ton of booty space
customer_reviews.text: These fit a tiny bit slender so if you have a bigger butt I would say pass because there just insnt a ton of booty in them . I like the quality and they are mesh and lightweight. Each pair was a little different but I will probably have these for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Shane Blair

customer_reviews.title: buy like 30 pair. do laundry once a month.
customer_reviews.text: do you want the support of whitey tightys with out the awkward whitey tightyness? do you want underwear that kinda breath so you don't get gnarly swamp ass? do you want to stop accidentally sitting on your balls like an old man? do you you have any dignity?
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to boxer briefs
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium. I have ~31" waist and an athletic bum from lifting. Fit is great with enough room for my package without feeling too compressed. I have ordered the packs 4 times now since the first one 4 months ago, and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 36" waist I got the XL and they fit perfect. Got them because one day in the heat ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally buy underwear this expensive but when I do it's gonna be these!!! I'm a 36" waist I got the XL and they fit perfect. Got them because one day in the heat of a FL day doing construction I got some super bad chafing on my inner thighs LOL I'm not fat but I'm no super model with a sexy thigh gap either, anyway these underwears or awesome and I'm no sure I can go back to regular boxer briefs..I've order more already
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clement

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, could use less raised stitching
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable, and priced reasonably. Seams/stitching is a little bit much for my personal preference, but I also do a high energy, high movement job. These are otherwise quite comfortable and worth checking out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: All I wear.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boxer briefs. Even though they are expensive and i usually wear the crotch out in a few months. They fit me right and I don’t have to worry about the waistband rolling up or the crotch restricting movement. The fly is good and they come in a variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Zacc Kernper

customer_reviews.title: I like them but not Tesla's best product.
customer_reviews.text: A few pair have had areas in the seam not attached to the waist properly. IE it had holes in it. No idea how to go about replacing
customer_reviews.author: -E

customer_reviews.title: Compresses kinda
customer_reviews.text: The seams are arranged a little odd to pull down material from the read if you have much girth in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Richter

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big and Overuse of material in Pouch
customer_reviews.text: DEF order a size down but jhaving a small waist i had no options.. Material an finish is great except way to much material for the pouch up front.
customer_reviews.author: PSDOLES

customer_reviews.title: Good Value / Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like that the 9" don't run up like the 6". They also keep your boys cool due to the perforated material, and that's the very I bought them in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Gautreaux

customer_reviews.title: NO more UA!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great underwear and I won't be buying anymore UA at twice the price. The length is a little long if you don't want them showing when wearing shorts but they don't ride up and keep everything in place. My only real complaint is that apparently if you have some junk in the trunk they might sit pretty low and show some crack. I might try the next size up and go with the 6in length in the future but am very satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Seth D.

customer_reviews.title: Great active shirts
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 34 waist, 6’2 & 180lbs the medium was a good fit. This is my first pair of active boxer stat briefs. Definitely help things bouncing around so much while running. Soft & good quality product. I ordered long pants too since winters are cold in Utah.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have big legs, still needed a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Awesome underwear, I wear a medium normally for Addidas boxer briefs and wear a small in these. Gave 5 stars because they recommended a size smaller but I ignored it. They are cool and don't ride or print in breathable dress pants
customer_reviews.author: Cyclist1371

customer_reviews.title: Well made, may run small depending on your expectations
customer_reviews.text: I would say that the fit runs small. I understand that these are meant to be form fitting and they are. The fabric is definitely synthetic not the texture of cotton. So why did I rate a five? Because they appear to be well made and are true to the description.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: sent wrong size and wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Order was completely wrong and quality ended up being subpar for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Park

customer_reviews.title: These are not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these underwear to wear for gymnastics under my sports cup and I was not impressed. The problem with these underwear is that they are made off mesh, so they have this tendency to go up you butt and make it very uncomfortable. I will not be ordering these underwear again anytime in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: crosstitchc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable undergarments
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of this underwear. The 6 inch length is perfect and they do not tend to drift or chafe. Definitely buy them a size smaller than your usual though or they may not fit well. Additionally, they may not be desirable if you prefer briefs that sit high on the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Jon J.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I would say just ok. Typically wear medium/size 34 and went with a medium. Have tried them during work hours at the office, gym and a pair during golf with the temps pushing 95degF. Found them to ride up the leg a bit too much and not as snug as i would like. Ok quality but likely will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these, Check them out!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They have micro holes in the legs that also help for breathing in the heat. He works all day and they have held up really well. Be aware, they run slightly small
customer_reviews.author: Candace Illing

customer_reviews.title: Butt cleavage if you have a big butt.
customer_reviews.text: So far they are my favorite underwear I own, but... I have what some people might call “junk in the trunk” and this causes me to have butt cleavage with these underwear. Other than that, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description says order a size down.  They lied.
customer_reviews.text: Well, they’re too small to start. Add to that I ordered the 6 inch inseam & my SO asked why I ordered “Booty Shorts”. I’ll probably order a size up & a longer inseam as they’re made well, but this order was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bromberg

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Another 5 star review. Fits great. Comfortable. No problems and better than cotton. Tags say L but US fit is M. I also bought the longer version briefs and think these are better for me
customer_reviews.author: AdventureRider45

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing them now. They are pretty nice. Comfortable and a good fit. They keep things in place and leave just the right amoount of "room to roam" if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Consider going down a size if you want a compression fit.
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to go down to an X-Small which is weird, I'm usually a small for underwear sizing (I'm a 30-31) I have these in both a small and an extra small. The smalls are definitely more a relaxed fit but the x-small is a more compression fit along the lines of the Under Armour underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Comfortable, less chafing!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and has helped tremendously on the chafing when I work 12 hour days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: aaron plunkett

customer_reviews.title: If you got a small rear, then recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Ideal if you have a smaller butt. Us sprinters do not. Slim wastes, but huge rears and big thighs. I have found Adidas to accommodate for this nicely. These, not so much. Makes sense I guess, their target demographic is Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: JHawk88

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These things are just amazing! The heat working and sweat wicking properties are incredible! They're great as athletic wear, or just regular clothing, and they have outlasted other brands that I bought before. I'm such a fan, I've already recommended them to dozens of friends!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dees

customer_reviews.title: bad description
customer_reviews.text: do not buy unless you want short shorts, i ordered the same ones from this selection and got two different sizes but other than that this is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: These are just so much better than the cotton briefs I've worn all my life
customer_reviews.text: These are just so much better than the cotton briefs I've worn all my life. And the Teslas are much less expensive than some of the other leading brands. The fabric is light, cool, and easy to care for. A total win.
customer_reviews.author: Pete in NY

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These fit quite well. The fabric is very breathable, especially wearing them to the gym or work. Durability has also been good. They have shown no wear and tear from washing and no piling.
customer_reviews.author: C Burris

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in about a month, 4/5 uses
customer_reviews.text: I've worn and washed both pairs 4/5 times. The stitching where the elastic band meets the rest of the underwear has already come undone to the point of not being able to wear either of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mspo

customer_reviews.title: SIZE DOWN
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is off. Go a size down. I'm a 30-32 inch waist and I needed a small for a snug enough fit. Other than that I like them. I don't know if they are Elon Musk's Tesla brand but I hope sales help support him and his company.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable boxers I've ever worn, I've also tried Adidas and Under Armour compression briefs but these absolutely blow those out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Justinstimpson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the best. Other ones are not the same material so beware.
customer_reviews.author: chrisj

customer_reviews.title: BEST. UNDERWEAR. EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for about a year now. I have replaced all of my "draws" with this brand. I have about 10 pair, and will never go back. Love them! Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Nice and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size L for underwear but with these I had to perchase them in a size M. (Size L was too big so I had to return them for some size M) These are pretty comfortable and not overly tight. Stretchy material
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable underwear I've ever worn. I love the color variety and will eventually have a pair in every color.
customer_reviews.author: David Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: quality not ok, got worn out fast, material no good
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: They're just great
customer_reviews.text: I love these -- the way they fit, their ability to keep me cool, etc. Wish you could buy single-color packs, and I wish there were more colors. Still, I'm gradually replacing my old boxer briefs with these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Connor

customer_reviews.title: breath well, dont get damp anymore.
customer_reviews.text: cool, confortable, fit great. even being 6foot 4inches and 260 pounds they fit great. would tell anyone to but a few pairs for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: mongoose58

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: These ran so small I actually had to return then. If your man has any booty at all then these are not for him.
customer_reviews.author: #boymomlife

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Well made, look cool, fit me perfectly. I ordered an M and they sent me a L, and good thing, cause an M would have for sure been too small. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: marquistadorous

customer_reviews.title: Feels great. Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to Under Armor. Boxer Jock 3". Fits well. Feels great. Pleasantly surprised. Under Armor Medium. Tesla Small. Will buy more when needed. Thank you for saving me money!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Been trying several different “less expensive” type of boxer briefs. These are top 1 or 2 so far. Like the extra room in crotch area but tighter fit in leg area.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Seams were an issue
customer_reviews.text: Overall fit as expected. Seams though on the backside were more pronounced than would like and bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Fit ok, a little on the small side...
customer_reviews.text: These fit alright, nothing to write home about. They're a little on the small side. I have a 32 waist and they ride up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I like the longer knee briefs and these are top notch
customer_reviews.text: I like the longer knee briefs and these are top notch. Lightweight material is flexible and absorbs sweat through workouts. And they don't creep up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but not for me..
customer_reviews.text: The undies are nice..love the colors but mesh is not for me...now I know.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo carvajal

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting underwear
customer_reviews.text: I really like wearing these in and out of the gym. These fit great and come at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Guy

customer_reviews.title: Super cool all day long
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way and look and feel great, made well, this is a buy again item for sure
customer_reviews.author: YURI

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase worth the money. Looks great arrived really fast
customer_reviews.author: nedra poore

customer_reviews.title: These are great and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great and comfortable, I've tried several brands with the fly and the tesla were the most comfortable. Although it has been a couple weeks since I ordered these, but they are no longer available. I would love to buy some more of these if they come back.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S Zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Better than more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend likes these better than the exeficio ones and these are way cheaper. Plus they look amazing on him.
customer_reviews.author: CCM

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best undies I have every worn. I have had a few pair for a couple of months and they seem to be holding up well. Breathable and stay in place with no pinch. A+ design.
customer_reviews.author: Jip

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: quality for less, husband really likes these and wants more so that is on the list for father's day gift ideas
customer_reviews.author: RWalker74

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of these and I’ll never go back to cotton boxers or boxer briefs again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and breathable. They do ride a little low on the hips but surprisingly comfortable despite that.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The stitching should not go all the way up the front and the butt. It's very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: scott m.

customer_reviews.title: Great men's underwear
customer_reviews.text: Great men's underwear. Great for sports, hiking, travelling, action. Kept me cool, dried fast and stayed in palce.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: They're nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and comfortable, however my only complaint is the seems feel a little rough on the body. Other than that they are comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: The guy from that thing

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised! Good fit and well made for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Crazycarl

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, itchy and sloppy fit. I have Tsla compression shorts that are great, these were a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan H. Ragnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: They're right about sizing down, I did and it fit perfectly. I use them as compression shorts at the gym. They're not super roomy in front so I don't think I'd like wearing them all day. But they're perfect for working out!
customer_reviews.author: Will Kenly

customer_reviews.title: these fit and feel Anazing!
customer_reviews.text: these fit and feel amazing!! these are better than i was expecting. just as described. I loved them so much that i reordered more. HIGHLY RECOMEND
customer_reviews.author: Joshin Thebox

customer_reviews.title: Go 1 size down!
customer_reviews.text: These really are relaxed stretch. Im XXL and went XL and they feel a bit loose. I love the fit, length and it has a fly opening.
customer_reviews.author: firstlast

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable material. They keep me very dry when I workout. I have big quads and I love that these do not ride up when I’m working out.
customer_reviews.author: Bogar

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and breathable
customer_reviews.text: My Tesla compression shorts are comfortable and they fit great. They feel great and breath well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, breathable, great for regular wear but not workouts . If the waist around the back it would stay up, so I dont have to keep pulling them up when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenpachi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They didn't smell of chemicals. Nicly woven. Light. Fit perfect. Im a medium. 5'10 and 185. Average body. Like I don't look fat, but I'm not putting shirtless pics on tinder. "Marginally" fat. These fit great. I'm the number one fan.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Waist band rolls over; don’t fit well and I’ll not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable bought the next size up so that my junk wouldn't be so bunched up. Good stretch, looks great, feels great! Bought me some more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super dupper very comfortable and satisfied buyer here.. no need for long review thats all i can tell with this product
customer_reviews.author: REALfknHOKAGE

customer_reviews.title: feels comfortable ,  and secure
customer_reviews.text: nice color and style, holds up well all day long. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: NBadventures

customer_reviews.title: Bunch way to hard
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the money but they get uncomfortable from all the bunching they do. Feel like my junk has the circulation cut off..
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Good product but looks like it's no longer on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent underwear. Comparable to UA iso chill. However when I tried to order another pair they are not in the store. Looks like a lot of Tesla gear was pulled from the store. It's a shame because their products worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Browning
